documenttitle.text: Red Hat Security Advisory: rabbitmq-server security update

note.text:
An update for rabbitmq-server is now available for Red Hat OpenStack
Platform 15 (Stein).

Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact
of Low. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which
gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from
the CVE link in the References section.
note.title: Topic

note.text:
RabbitMQ is an implementation of AMQP, the emerging standard for high
performance enterprise messaging. The RabbitMQ server is a robust and
scalable implementation of an AMQP broker.

Security Fix(es):

* not properly sanitized user input may lead to XSS (CVE-2019-11291)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS
score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE
page listed in the References section.

description.text:

described in this advisory, refer to:

https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258
